data.message:
I see a blue sky full of vices.
one against one, in two against nothing.
I see the sky of your blue eyes full of vices
struggling to survive in this dog world
I see the light at the end of the turnin wanting to shine, but it's out in the world
My legs are not ready to run.
I'm going to die, but I know it's not now

Look at your life and see that you can still live
Do not say no to her.
you can shine
shine
shine
shine bright
the world is watching

look at your mirror
and see that you can be bigger
look at the world
and see that you can still be giant
look at your mirror
he is wanting to shine
do not leave it behind.
look at your mirror
he is wanting to shine

The city lights are fading
I can not see my world.
it's all collapsing
the world is suffering
with his war, with his vices
But will not the world have not seen me yet?
Why am I not shining more than the hollywood stars?
world opens the doors I want to enter

look at my mirror
and see that I can be bigger
look. world, see I can be bigger
Look, you can still be giant.
look at your mirror
he is wanting to shine
do not leave it behind.
look at your mirror
he is wanting to shine

let life go your way
No one knows what the end of it will be.
this is the great incognita of humanity
do not stop living because of the evil of the people
live your life like never before
Look at your mirror and see you can be great
live in the deep as you've never lived
because life goes by quickly
let your mirror shine
let the world see your form.

look at your mirror
and see that you can be bigger
look at the world
and see that you can still be giant
look at your mirror
he is wanting to shine
do not leave it behind.
look at your mirror
he is wanting to shine

let the world see your shine
shine
shine
shine
more than the hollywood stars

replies.message: Esp the line: 'I see the sky of your blue eyes full of vices'
